Html: I have a ClusteredColumnChart and values that fall on the columns are white and colors that appear above the columns are black. How do you set the colors?

I have the same question. Still no reply?

I have a palette with lighter colors and the numbers are unreadable. I need to be able to select another color. I can't find the property that exposes these labels. The ones outside the bars take the foreground color assigned to the control (property Foreground).
